name: SinkHole (Taru)
description:
SinkHole is an arcade-like game where you simply have to drive around to increase your score. It sounds pretty simple right?

...

But there's of course a catch! The level itself is slowly falling apart making it challenging to reach an amazing high-score, in every level.

But you wouldn't run away from a challenge like that, now would you?

The game is playable on Windows, Linux, Android, Mac OSx, Switch and DS!

The Switch and DS versions aren't indorsed by nintendo in any way and only run on homebrewed devices.

Contains music ©2021 Joshua McLean (https://joshua-mclean.itch.io) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International
